Texto: 
widended mediastinum on cxr.
thoracic aortic aneurysm
aortic disection
aortic aneurysm
lymphatic mass
pulmonary mass
65yo f with copd and new onset mid-scapular pain 6wks s/p aaa repair.
25% of all aortic aneurysms are found in the thorax. it is extremely unusual for a patient to have both at the same time.
